p: Cytotoxicity of the EOs was measured on two human cancer cell lines; A375, and MCF7 using the MTT assay. The cell lines were subjected to increasing doses of the EOs ranging from 12-1600 Î¼g/ml. After exposure to the EOs of Z. majdae for 48 hr, the growth of cell lines was inhibited in a concentration-dependent manner ( Table 4).
